messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: Does anyone know how I can set the binary to generate CSV output? I remember this used to be the default export format but I don't see it anywhere in the output. Reference for old process: https://instabase.com/docs/reference/apps/flow/export-workflows/#export-final-results
If you want the binary to generate a csv as the final step youll need to add a postflow hook or an extra apply udf step, depending on what you are trying to do
I think there was some way to do this with a dropdown in metaflow only, where it would merge everything into a csv?
ya there is, but that way is silly
I think itâ€™s only in multiflow

messages.sender: georgia chestnuts rust-ing on an open fire
messages.message: so can you do this for metaflow, binary, and/or multi-flows just in different ways?
oh wait I misspoke. In multiflow code I had seen `CSVS_TO_EXCEL` flag which is not what you were talking about. @Justin or @shaunak would know best about this.
highly recommend you do this in a flow step rather than in a setting
